snippet: Viktor F. Yanukovych, Ukraine’s former leader, called on President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to act, but vowed to oppose military intervention by Russia or anyone else.
abstract: Ukraine's deposed president Viktor F Yanukovych declares himself the country's lawful leader during an appearance in Russia; calls on Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin to act, but vows to oppose military intervention by Russia or anyone else.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by David M. Herszenhorn, Steven Erlanger and Andrew E. Kramer from Kiev, Ukraine; and Alison Smale, Patrick Reevell and Noah Sneider from Crimea.

lead_paragraph: Viktor F. Yanukovych, Ukraine’s former leader, called on President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to act, but vowed to oppose military intervention by Russia or anyone else.

headline.main: Ukrainian Ex-President Speaks Out From Russia
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Ex-President Speaks Out From Russia
